body:
I failed to build ncurses 6.0 with Intel compiler 16.0.3. Has anyone encountered similar issues? Part of the erorr messages are as follows.

```
$ spack install ncurses %intel@16.0.3
...
/bin/sh ./run_tic.sh
/bin/sh -c 'for name in *.pc; do /usr/bin/install -c -m 644 $name /lustre/spack/sandybridge/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-16.0.3/ncurses-6.0-vzmgon2fmla4wblduj4r7lzamcoponm6/lib/pkgconfig/$name; done'
** Building terminfo database, please wait...
Running sh ./shlib tic to install /lustre/spack/sandybridge/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-16.0.3/ncurses-6.0-vzmgon2fmla4wblduj4r7lzamcoponm6/share/terminfo ...

        You may see messages regarding extended capabilities, e.g., AX.
        These are extended terminal capabilities which are compiled
        using
                tic -x
        If you have ncurses 4.2 applications, you should read the INSTALL
        document, and install the terminfo without the -x option.

./shlib: line 141: 181458 Segmentation fault      (core dumped) tic -x -s -o /lustre/spack/sandybridge/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-16.0.3/ncurses-6.0-vzmgon2fmla4wblduj4r7lzamcoponm6/share/terminfo terminfo.tmp
? tic could not build /lustre/spack/sandybridge/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-16.0.3/ncurses-6.0-vzmgon2fmla4wblduj4r7lzamcoponm6/share/terminfo
make[1]: *** [install.data] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/rpm/pytest-of-rpm/pytest-4/test_fetch0/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-HvKJK2/ncurses-6.0/misc'
make: *** [install] Error 2
````
title: Unable to build ncurses 6.0 with Intel compiler
